body_html:
I am using MSE loss and the targets do not have NaN. This is evidenced by the fact that the training went thru 3 epochs without any issues.

Removing activation_fn=tf.nn.elu makes the problem goes away. Replacing with tf.nn.relu also works.
body_text:
I am using MSE loss and the targets do not have NaN. This is evidenced by the fact that the training went thru 3 epochs without any issues.
Removing activation_fn=tf.nn.elu makes the problem goes away. Replacing with tf.nn.relu also works.
body:
I am using MSE loss and the targets do not have NaN. This is evidenced by the fact that the training went thru 3 epochs without any issues.

Removing `activation_fn=tf.nn.elu` makes the problem goes away. Replacing with tf.nn.relu also works.
